sql.query: UPDATE versions SET lazy_load = 0, product_class_name = '' WHERE product_type = 'core'

INSERT INTO email_templates_default (email_key, can_edit, can_disable, from_role_id, to_role_id) SELECT 'PAYPAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED', can_edit, can_disable, from_role_id, to_role_id FROM email_templates_default WHERE email_key = 'MANUAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED'

INSERT INTO email_templates_default_data (email_key, locale, subject, body, description) SELECT 'PAYPAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED', locale, subject, body, description FROM email_templates_default_data WHERE email_key = 'MANUAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED'
INSERT INTO email_templates (email_key, assoc_id, enabled, assoc_type) SELECT 'PAYPAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED', assoc_id, enabled, assoc_type FROM email_templates WHERE email_key = 'MANUAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED'

INSERT INTO email_templates_data (email_key, locale, assoc_id, subject, body, assoc_type) SELECT 'PAYPAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED', locale, assoc_id, subject, body, assoc_type FROM email_templates_data WHERE email_key = 'MANUAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED'
UPDATE papers p, conferences c, sched_confs sc SET p.locale = c.primary_locale WHERE p.sched_conf_id = sc.sched_conf_id AND sc.conference_id = c.conference_id
UPDATE papers SET locale = c.primary_locale FROM sched_confs sc, conferences c WHERE papers.sched_conf_id = sc.sched_conf_id AND sc.conference_id = c.conference_id

INSERT INTO conference_settings (conference_id, locale, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type) SELECT conference_id, locale, 'supportedSubmissionLocales', setting_value, setting_type FROM conference_settings WHERE setting_name = 'supportedFormLocales'
